p: Hepatitis A virus (HAV) is an enterovirus belonging to the Picornaviridae family. It has an icosahedral shape and lacks an envelope. The virion measures 27â€“28 nm in diameter and there is only one known serotype. The HAV genome consists of a positive sense RNA that is 7.48 kb long, single stranded, and linear. HAV RNA has a long open reading frame consisting of 6,681 nucleotides [ 70].
